Html: This may not be a feature request or bug request, but it is an issue I just ran into. In my ViewModel and Model PCLs. I make async calls and whern I try to bind the ViewModel to the UI. Nothing happens. I managed to create what I feel is a hack by adding a property in the ViewModelLocator to pass a delegate of the Dispatcher.CheckOnInvokeUI method,. I then use the factory to pass that into my Portable libraries... it works but it would be nice if this could be addressed in the framework some how.
